1W0261








[solution]		 _____ 1W0262








[solution]      [Next]
1W0263








[solution]		 _____ 1W0264








[solution]      [Next]
  • 1W0261
    • 1. Be3 traps the queen. It has no
    • safe squares.

    		_____
  • 1W0262
    • 1. Rg7+ skewers the black king,
    • winning the rook

  • 1W0263
    • 1. Re6 mates. Note that 1. f5 is
    • not checkmate.

    		_____
  • 1W0264
    • 1. Qh3+ forks the knight on h5 and
    • the king on c8

    1W0265








    [solution]    		 _____ 1W0266








    [solution]      [Next]
    1W0267








    [solution]    		 _____ 1W0268








    [solution]      [Next]
  • 1W0265
    • 1. fxe8=Q+ uncovers an attack on
    • the Queen on c7.

    		_____
  • 1W0266
    • 1. Qf7 mate or 1. Qe6 mate! 1.
    • Re6 is not mate.

  • 1W0267
    • 1. Qxg4+ forks the king on g7 and
    • the knight on d7.

    		_____
  • 1W0268
    • 1. Nf6+ forks the king and queen
    • with a double check

    1W0269








    [solution]    		 _____ 1W0270








    [solution]      [Next]
    1W0271








    [solution]    		 _____ 1W0272








    [solution]      [Next]
  • 1W0269
    • 1. Nf6+ discovers an attack on d7
    • by the Queen on d1.

    		_____
  • 1W0270
    • Clever is 1. Ne6 mate. Thanks to
    • OnceAknight on ICC.

  • 1W0271
    • 1. Qd7+ forces the trade of queens
    • and wins the game.

    		_____
  • 1W0272
    • 1. Rf8 mate. Note that the Queen
    • on g7
    • is pinned.

    1W0273








    [solution]    		 _____ 1W0274








    [solution]      [Next]
    1W0275








    [solution]    		 _____ 1W0276








    [solution]      [Next]
  • 1W0273
    • 1. Bxf5 wins a knight because the
    • pawn on e6 is pinned.

    		_____
  • 1W0274
    • 1. Qd8 mate. Black's rook blocks
    • an
    • escape square.

  • 1W0275
    • Both 1. Qf8 mate and Qh7 mate are
    • faster than 1. Qg6+ Kh8

    		_____
  • 1W0276
    • 1. 1. Qh7 mate. The knight blocks
    • the escape square on f8.

    1W0277








    [solution]    		 _____ 1W0278








    [solution]      [Next]
    1W0279








    [solution]    		 _____ 1W0280








    [solution]      [Next]
  • 1W0277
    • 1. Nxc6 attacks the queen and
    • uncovers an attack on
    • d6

    		_____
  • 1W0278
    • 1. Ne6 mate (It is mate because
    • the rook on d1 also checks.)

  • 1W0279
    • 1. Bxg6 wins the knight because of
    • the pin on the pawn on a7.

    		_____
  • 1W0280
    • 1. Qa4+ forks the king and rook.
    • Thanks to Eon on FICS.
